newsitem.title: FINLAND: FORECAST - Fiskars 9-mth profit seen up.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST - Fiskars 9-mth profit seen up.

text.p: A Reuter survey of analysts covering Finnish equities showed a 185 million markka median forecast for durable consumer goods manufacturer Fiskars Oy's January-September profit after financial items, before extraordinaries.
The results are due on November 20 around 0900/0700 GMT.
In January-September 1995, Fiskar posted a 147 million markka profit.
For Fiskars' full-year 1996 profit, nine of the 12 analysts polled gave a median forecast of 235 million markka (mean 242 million) in a 220-280 million markka range.

Contributors to the survey were Aros Securities, AG Private Bankers, Alfred Berg, Aktia Bank, Carnegie, Erik Selin, Evli Securities, FIM Securities, Interbank, Merita Securities, Opstock and Postipankki.
